attributes.action: Public inquiry into Electoral Commission's findings to influence Government.
attributes.background: 'asking for a public inquiry into whether the findings of the Electoral Commission should influence the UK Government's Brexit policy, if that's what you'd like to happen.Stop brexit as it was only  ADVISORY thus people that knew did not go to vote. Irregularities in the campaign to be acknowledged'

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223729
